Title: Tousif
Name: Tousifur Rahman
Description: Graduate from Bangladesh Army University of Engineering and Technology. Passionate about start ups, Supply Chain and Marketing.
I grab every chance I get to travel, learn and create.
AboutContent: I’m a Electrical and Electronics major by day, a runner by evening, a functional enterpreneur by midnight and a hustler always.
If you can’t find me, it’s because I’m already into deep thinking, building something, or studying for an exam
I am passionate about Space Technology and Human Psychology (though, never studied them formally).
I love the way the concept of "work" has evolved over the past decades, and hence would love to travel and work together whenever I can.
WorkContent: I am currently looking for a job which will allow me to grow as a person

InternShips.name: Lab AR from 13 February,2019 to 17 February,2020 as Assistant Engineer (Planning and Development)
Bangladesh Power Development Board from 30 January,2018 to 26 February,2018 as Industrial Trainee

ProjectsStartLine: Some of the activites during university life

Projects.name: Program Coordinator at Arduino Day Bangladesh-2017

CVStartLine: I am always open to collaborations with impactful work. Feel free to reach out if you want to work together :)
